title: RIOT input on Drafted Normals
body:
There are multiple discussion from couple of months ago in regards to this top. Is there any progression towards drafted normals? 
Possibility even have Mon/Thurs/Sun as drafted normals only then, Tues/Wed/Fri/Sat as normal normals??? 
RIOT Input?

replies.body: I'd like for draft norms to come back, I like strategically outplaying my opponents in champ select but id prefer to do it without the pressure of losing LP.
they said ages ago that they werent doing it or having plans of doing it
